subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|憧憬|しょうけい}}, {{ja-r|憧憬|どうけい|[[long#Etymology 2|long]]ing, [[yearn]]ing}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: * Some dictionaries apparently classify the ''dō'' reading as ''{{ll|ja|慣用音|kan'yō-on}}'' only, despite the second borrowing from Middle Chinese {{ltc-l|憧|id=2}}.
